about_the_game:
Dive into the heart of darkness with FERB, a gripping horror game that drops you deep into the shadows of a mysterious cave packed with secrets and bone-chilling horrors. You’re a seasoned explorer on a mission to find out what happened to a missing adventurer—but you’ll quickly realize you’re not alone down here.

Hiding in the dark is FERB, a terrifying, half-robotic creature that thrives on fear. Its glowing gaze is always watching, and every step you take brings you closer to uncovering the cave’s secrets… but also closer to it.

With five intense chapters to explore, you’ll solve puzzles, gather clues, and unravel the mystery of what happened to those who came before you. Each discovery paints a darker, more unsettling picture, and survival will test your courage, wits, and nerves.

You can go it alone, armed only with your instincts, or team up with friends in a nerve-wracking co-op mode—where every move, every sound, and every wrong turn could be your last.

But be warned: FERB isn’t just lurking in the shadows—it’s hunting you. Can you outsmart it, survive the horrors, and uncover the truth about the cave? There’s only one way to find out.
